'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
The Radiant Court is the heart of commerce in the Free City, with merchants plying their wares all over the piers.

==Points of interest==
* This is a fairly large area divided into roughly two halves by the canal. [[Birna]] has a food stand next to the troupe stage with [[Calandra]] standing among her actors with ship hats. 
* The south-western corners has [[Rosanella]] and [[Yngfrith]] patronizing the bar. Moving over to the eastern end, you find [[Dessiral]] haunting the pier.
* Beyond stands [[Ramaso]] and his emporium, with [[Co'el Marcellus]] overlooking the area.

==Characters==
* [[Calandra]], head of the Pegleg Performers
* [[Dessiral]], looking over the berth, hands out bounties.
* [[Co'el Marcellus]], a con artist and trainer.
* [[First Mate Fallon]], a street poet
* [[Yngfrith]], the owner of Modwyr
;After [[A Tidy Performance]]:
* [[Barquami]], a blind, blue aumaua
* [[Taerna]], pale elf wizard.
;Merchants
* [[Birna]], food
* [[Rosanella]], bartender
* [[Ramaso]], weapons, armor, gear
* [[Dimesa]], in [[The Treasure Trove]]. Sells weapons, armor, accessories.

==Loot==
* [[Hemp]] - "Stray Dog": In the south-eastern corner.
* [[Epsilon]] - "Stray Cat": In the south-western corner.
* [[Pale Hide]], [[Eager Blade]], [[Amra]]: Sold by [[Ramaso]]
